text: Last Monday (July 31st) we were nearly surrounded by ice, which closed
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: many hundred miles from any land; but this apparition seemed to denote that
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: it was not, in reality, so distant as we had supposed. Shut in, however, by
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: ice, it was impossible to follow his track, which we had observed with the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: greatest attention.

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: and oblivion in the same country where he had formerly been
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: wretchedness. My father loved Beaufort with the truest friendship and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: He bitterly deplored the false pride which led his friend to a conduct
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: so little worthy of the affection that united them. He lost no time in
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: the world again through his credit and assistance.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: The ascent is precipitous, but the path is cut into continual and short
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: of snow, down which stones continually roll from above; one of them is
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: I looked on the valley beneath; vast mists were rising from the rivers
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: which ran through it and curling in thick wreaths around the opposite
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: mountains, whose summits were hid in the uniform clouds, while rain
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: poured from the dark sky and added to the melancholy impression I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: received from the objects around me. Alas! Why does man boast of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: sensibilities superior to those apparent in the brute; it only renders
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: them more necessary beings. If our impulses were confined to hunger,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: thirst, and desire, we might be nearly free; but now we are moved by
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: every wind that blows and a chance word or scene that that word may
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: convey to us.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: We rest; a dream has power to poison sleep.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: We rise; one wand’ring thought pollutes the day.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: We feel, conceive, or reason; laugh or weep,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: Embrace fond woe, or cast our cares away;
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: It is the same: for, be it joy or sorrow,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: The path of its departure still is free.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: Man’s yesterday may ne’er be like his morrow;
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: Nought may endure but mutability!

text: It was nearly noon when I arrived at the top of the ascent. For some
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: time I sat upon the rock that overlooks the sea of ice. A mist covered
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: both that and the surrounding mountains. Presently a breeze dissipated
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: the cloud, and I descended upon the glacier. The surface is very
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: uneven, rising like the waves of a troubled sea, descending low, and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: interspersed by rifts that sink deep. The field of ice is almost a
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: league in width, but I spent nearly two hours in crossing it. The
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: opposite mountain is a bare perpendicular rock. From the side where I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: now stood Montanvert was exactly opposite, at the distance of a league;
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: and above it rose Mont Blanc, in awful majesty. I remained in a recess
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: of the rock, gazing on this wonderful and stupendous scene. The sea,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: or rather the vast river of ice, wound among its dependent mountains,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: whose aerial summits hung over its recesses. Their icy and glittering
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: peaks shone in the sunlight over the clouds. My heart, which was
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: before sorrowful, now swelled with something like joy; I exclaimed,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Wandering spirits, if indeed ye wander, and do not rest in your narrow
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: beds, allow me this faint happiness, or take me, as your companion,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: away from the joys of life.”
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: As I said this I suddenly beheld the figure of a man, at some distance,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: advancing towards me with superhuman speed. He bounded over the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: crevices in the ice, among which I had walked with caution; his
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: stature, also, as he approached, seemed to exceed that of man. I was
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: troubled; a mist came over my eyes, and I felt a faintness seize me,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: but I was quickly restored by the cold gale of the mountains. I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: perceived, as the shape came nearer (sight tremendous and abhorred!)
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: that it was the wretch whom I had created. I trembled with rage and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: horror, resolving to wait his approach and then close with him in
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: mortal combat. He approached; his countenance bespoke bitter anguish,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: combined with disdain and malignity, while its unearthly ugliness
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: rendered it almost too horrible for human eyes. But I scarcely
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: observed this; rage and hatred had at first deprived me of utterance,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: and I recovered only to overwhelm him with words expressive of furious
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: detestation and contempt.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Devil,” I exclaimed, “do you dare approach me? And do
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: not you fear the fierce vengeance of my arm wreaked on your miserable head?
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: Begone, vile insect! Or rather, stay, that I may trample you to dust! And,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: oh! That I could, with the extinction of your miserable existence, restore
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: those victims whom you have so diabolically murdered!”
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “I expected this reception,” said the dæmon. “All men hate the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: wretched; how, then, must I be hated, who am miserable beyond all
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: living things! Yet you, my creator, detest and spurn me, thy creature,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: to whom thou art bound by ties only dissoluble by the annihilation of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: one of us. You purpose to kill me. How dare you sport thus with life?
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: Do your duty towards me, and I will do mine towards you and the rest of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: mankind. If you will comply with my conditions, I will leave them and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: you at peace; but if you refuse, I will glut the maw of death, until it
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: be satiated with the blood of your remaining friends.”
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Abhorred monster! Fiend that thou art! The tortures of hell are too
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: mild a vengeance for thy crimes. Wretched devil! You reproach me with
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: your creation, come on, then, that I may extinguish the spark which I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: so negligently bestowed.”
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: My rage was without bounds; I sprang on him, impelled by all the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: feelings which can arm one being against the existence of another.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: He easily eluded me and said,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Be calm! I entreat you to hear me before you give vent to your hatred
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: on my devoted head. Have I not suffered enough, that you seek to
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: increase my misery? Life, although it may only be an accumulation of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: anguish, is dear to me, and I will defend it. Remember, thou hast made
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: me more powerful than thyself; my height is superior to thine, my
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: joints more supple. But I will not be tempted to set myself in
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: opposition to thee. I am thy creature, and I will be even mild and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: docile to my natural lord and king if thou wilt also perform thy part,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: the which thou owest me. Oh, Frankenstein, be not equitable to every
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: other and trample upon me alone, to whom thy justice, and even thy
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: clemency and affection, is most due. Remember that I am thy creature;
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: I ought to be thy Adam, but I am rather the fallen angel, whom thou
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: drivest from joy for no misdeed. Everywhere I see bliss, from which I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: alone am irrevocably excluded. I was benevolent and good; misery made
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: me a fiend. Make me happy, and I shall again be virtuous.”
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Begone! I will not hear you. There can be no community between you
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: and me; we are enemies. Begone, or let us try our strength in a fight,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: in which one must fall.”
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “How can I move thee? Will no entreaties cause thee to turn a
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: favourable eye upon thy creature, who implores thy goodness and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: compassion? Believe me, Frankenstein, I was benevolent; my soul glowed
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: with love and humanity; but am I not alone, miserably alone? You, my
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: creator, abhor me; what hope can I gather from your fellow creatures,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: who owe me nothing? They spurn and hate me. The desert mountains and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: dreary glaciers are my refuge. I have wandered here many days; the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: caves of ice, which I only do not fear, are a dwelling to me, and the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: only one which man does not grudge. These bleak skies I hail, for they
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: are kinder to me than your fellow beings. If the multitude of mankind
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: knew of my existence, they would do as you do, and arm themselves for
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: my destruction. Shall I not then hate them who abhor me? I will keep
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: no terms with my enemies. I am miserable, and they shall share my
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: wretchedness. Yet it is in your power to recompense me, and deliver
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: them from an evil which it only remains for you to make so great, that
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: not only you and your family, but thousands of others, shall be
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: swallowed up in the whirlwinds of its rage. Let your compassion be
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: moved, and do not disdain me. Listen to my tale; when you have heard
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: that, abandon or commiserate me, as you shall judge that I deserve.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: But hear me. The guilty are allowed, by human laws, bloody as they
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: are, to speak in their own defence before they are condemned. Listen
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: to me, Frankenstein. You accuse me of murder, and yet you would, with
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: a satisfied conscience, destroy your own creature. Oh, praise the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: eternal justice of man! Yet I ask you not to spare me; listen to me,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: and then, if you can, and if you will, destroy the work of your hands.”
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Why do you call to my remembrance,” I rejoined, “circumstances of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: which I shudder to reflect, that I have been the miserable origin and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: author? Cursed be the day, abhorred devil, in which you first saw
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: light! Cursed (although I curse myself) be the hands that formed you!
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: You have made me wretched beyond expression. You have left me no power
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: to consider whether I am just to you or not. Begone! Relieve me from
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: the sight of your detested form.”
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Thus I relieve thee, my creator,” he said, and placed his hated hands
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: before my eyes, which I flung from me with violence; “thus I take from
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: thee a sight which you abhor. Still thou canst listen to me and grant
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: me thy compassion. By the virtues that I once possessed, I demand this
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: from you. Hear my tale; it is long and strange, and the temperature of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: this place is not fitting to your fine sensations; come to the hut upon
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: the mountain. The sun is yet high in the heavens; before it descends
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: to hide itself behind your snowy precipices and illuminate another
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: world, you will have heard my story and can decide. On you it rests,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: whether I quit for ever the neighbourhood of man and lead a harmless
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: life, or become the scourge of your fellow creatures and the author of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: your own speedy ruin.”
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: As he said this he led the way across the ice; I followed. My heart
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: was full, and I did not answer him, but as I proceeded, I weighed the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: various arguments that he had used and determined at least to listen to
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: his tale. I was partly urged by curiosity, and compassion confirmed my
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: resolution. I had hitherto supposed him to be the murderer of my
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: brother, and I eagerly sought a confirmation or denial of this opinion.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: For the first time, also, I felt what the duties of a creator towards
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: his creature were, and that I ought to render him happy before I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: complained of his wickedness. These motives urged me to comply with
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: his demand. We crossed the ice, therefore, and ascended the opposite
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: rock. The air was cold, and the rain again began to descend; we
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: entered the hut, the fiend with an air of exultation, I with a heavy
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: heart and depressed spirits. But I consented to listen, and seating
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: myself by the fire which my odious companion had lighted, he thus began
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: his tale.

text: Chapter 11
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “It is with considerable difficulty that I remember the original era of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: my being; all the events of that period appear confused and indistinct.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: A strange multiplicity of sensations seized me, and I saw, felt, heard,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: and smelt at the same time; and it was, indeed, a long time before I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: learned to distinguish between the operations of my various senses. By
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: degrees, I remember, a stronger light pressed upon my nerves, so that I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: was obliged to shut my eyes. Darkness then came over me and troubled
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: me, but hardly had I felt this when, by opening my eyes, as I now
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: suppose, the light poured in upon me again. I walked and, I believe,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: descended, but I presently found a great alteration in my sensations.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: Before, dark and opaque bodies had surrounded me, impervious to my
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: touch or sight; but I now found that I could wander on at liberty, with
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: no obstacles which I could not either surmount or avoid. The light
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: became more and more oppressive to me, and the heat wearying me as I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: walked, I sought a place where I could receive shade. This was the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: forest near Ingolstadt; and here I lay by the side of a brook resting
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: from my fatigue, until I felt tormented by hunger and thirst. This
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: roused me from my nearly dormant state, and I ate some berries which I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: found hanging on the trees or lying on the ground. I slaked my thirst
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: at the brook, and then lying down, was overcome by sleep.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “It was dark when I awoke; I felt cold also, and half frightened, as it
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: were, instinctively, finding myself so desolate. Before I had quitted
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: your apartment, on a sensation of cold, I had covered myself with some
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: clothes, but these were insufficient to secure me from the dews of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: night. I was a poor, helpless, miserable wretch; I knew, and could
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: distinguish, nothing; but feeling pain invade me on all sides, I sat
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: down and wept.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Soon a gentle light stole over the heavens and gave me a sensation of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: pleasure. I started up and beheld a radiant form rise from among the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: trees. [The moon] I gazed with a kind of wonder. It moved slowly,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: but it enlightened my path, and I again went out in search of berries.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: I was still cold when under one of the trees I found a huge cloak, with
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: which I covered myself, and sat down upon the ground. No distinct
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: ideas occupied my mind; all was confused. I felt light, and hunger,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: and thirst, and darkness; innumerable sounds rang in my ears, and on
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: all sides various scents saluted me; the only object that I could
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: distinguish was the bright moon, and I fixed my eyes on that with
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: pleasure.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Several changes of day and night passed, and the orb of night had
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: greatly lessened, when I began to distinguish my sensations from each
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: other. I gradually saw plainly the clear stream that supplied me with
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: drink and the trees that shaded me with their foliage. I was delighted
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: when I first discovered that a pleasant sound, which often saluted my
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: ears, proceeded from the throats of the little winged animals who had
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: often intercepted the light from my eyes. I began also to observe,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: with greater accuracy, the forms that surrounded me and to perceive the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: boundaries of the radiant roof of light which canopied me. Sometimes I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: tried to imitate the pleasant songs of the birds but was unable.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: Sometimes I wished to express my sensations in my own mode, but the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: uncouth and inarticulate sounds which broke from me frightened me into
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: silence again.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “The moon had disappeared from the night, and again, with a lessened
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: form, showed itself, while I still remained in the forest. My
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: sensations had by this time become distinct, and my mind received every
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: day additional ideas. My eyes became accustomed to the light and to
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: perceive objects in their right forms; I distinguished the insect from
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: the herb, and by degrees, one herb from another. I found that the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: sparrow uttered none but harsh notes, whilst those of the blackbird and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: thrush were sweet and enticing.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “One day, when I was oppressed by cold, I found a fire which had been
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: left by some wandering beggars, and was overcome with delight at the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: warmth I experienced from it. In my joy I thrust my hand into the live
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: I thought, that the same cause should produce such opposite effects! I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: examined the materials of the fire, and to my joy found it to be
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: and would not burn. I was pained at this and sat still watching the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: operation of the fire. The wet wood which I had placed near the heat
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: dried and itself became inflamed. I reflected on this, and by touching
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: the various branches, I discovered the cause and busied myself in
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: plentiful supply of fire. When night came on and brought sleep with
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: it, I was in the greatest fear lest my fire should be extinguished. I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: covered it carefully with dry wood and leaves and placed wet branches
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: upon it; and then, spreading my cloak, I lay on the ground and sank
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: into sleep.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “It was morning when I awoke, and my first care was to visit the fire.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: I uncovered it, and a gentle breeze quickly fanned it into a flame. I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: observed this also and contrived a fan of branches, which roused the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: embers when they were nearly extinguished. When night came again I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: found, with pleasure, that the fire gave light as well as heat and that
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: the discovery of this element was useful to me in my food, for I found
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: some of the offals that the travellers had left had been roasted, and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: tasted much more savoury than the berries I gathered from the trees. I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: tried, therefore, to dress my food in the same manner, placing it on
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: the live embers. I found that the berries were spoiled by this

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Such was the history of my beloved cottagers. It impressed me deeply.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “I can hardly describe to you the effect of these books. They produced

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: Chapter 22
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: The voyage came to an end. We landed, and proceeded to Paris. I soon
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: found that I had overtaxed my strength and that I must repose before I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: could continue my journey. My father’s care and attentions were
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: indefatigable, but he did not know the origin of my sufferings and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: sought erroneous methods to remedy the incurable ill. He wished me to
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: seek amusement in society. I abhorred the face of man. Oh, not
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: abhorred! They were my brethren, my fellow beings, and I felt
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: attracted even to the most repulsive among them, as to creatures of an
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: to share their intercourse. I had unchained an enemy among them whose
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: joy it was to shed their blood and to revel in their groans. How they
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: would, each and all, abhor me and hunt me from the world, did they know
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: my unhallowed acts and the crimes which had their source in me!
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: My father yielded at length to my desire to avoid society and strove by
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: various arguments to banish my despair. Sometimes he thought that I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: felt deeply the degradation of being obliged to answer a charge of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: murder, and he endeavoured to prove to me the futility of pride.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Alas! My father,” said I, “how little do you know me.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: Human beings, their feelings and passions, would indeed be degraded if such
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: a wretch as I felt pride. Justine, poor unhappy Justine, was as innocent
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: as I, and she suffered the same charge; she died for it; and I am the cause
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: of this—I murdered her. William, Justine, and Henry—they all
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: died by my hands.”
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: It was long before he was restored, and I often thought that life was
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: entirely extinct. At length he opened his eyes; he breathed with
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: difficulty and was unable to speak. The surgeon gave him a composing
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: told me that my friend had certainly not many hours to live.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: His sentence was pronounced, and I could only grieve and be patient. I sat
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: by his bed, watching him; his eyes were closed, and I thought he slept; but
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: presently he called to me in a feeble voice, and bidding me come near,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: said, “Alas! The strength I relied on is gone; I feel that I shall
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: soon die, and he, my enemy and persecutor, may still be in being. Think
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: not, Walton, that in the last moments of my existence I feel that burning
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: hatred and ardent desire of revenge I once expressed; but I feel myself
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: justified in desiring the death of my adversary. During these last days I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: have been occupied in examining my past conduct; nor do I find it blamable.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: In a fit of enthusiastic madness I created a rational creature and was
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: bound towards him to assure, as far as was in my power, his happiness and
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: well-being. This was my duty, but there was another still paramount to
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: that. My duties towards the beings of my own species had greater claims to
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: my attention because they included a greater proportion of happiness or
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: misery. Urged by this view, I refused, and I did right in refusing, to
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: create a companion for the first creature. He showed unparalleled malignity
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: and selfishness in evil; he destroyed my friends; he devoted to destruction
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: beings who possessed exquisite sensations, happiness, and wisdom; nor do I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: know where this thirst for vengeance may end. Miserable himself that he may
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: render no other wretched, he ought to die. The task of his destruction was
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: mine, but I have failed. When actuated by selfish and vicious motives, I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: asked you to undertake my unfinished work, and I renew this request now,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: when I am only induced by reason and virtue.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “Yet I cannot ask you to renounce your country and friends to fulfil
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: this task; and now that you are returning to England, you will have
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: little chance of meeting with him. But the consideration of these
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: points, and the well balancing of what you may esteem your duties, I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: leave to you; my judgment and ideas are already disturbed by the near
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: approach of death. I dare not ask you to do what I think right, for I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: may still be misled by passion.
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “That he should live to be an instrument of mischief disturbs me; in
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: only happy one which I have enjoyed for several years. The forms of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: the beloved dead flit before me, and I hasten to their arms. Farewell,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: Walton! Seek happiness in tranquillity and avoid ambition, even if it
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: be only the apparently innocent one of distinguishing yourself in
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: science and discoveries. Yet why do I say this? I have myself been
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: blasted in these hopes, yet another may succeed.”

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: close! Oh, Frankenstein! Generous and self-devoted being! What does it
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: enemy, were now suspended by a mixture of curiosity and compassion. I
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: approached this tremendous being; I dared not again raise my eyes to his
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: attempted to speak, but the words died away on my lips. The monster
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: before you had urged your diabolical vengeance to this extremity,
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “he suffered not in the consummation of the deed. Oh! Not the
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: and hatred, it did not endure the violence of the change without
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: “After the murder of Clerval I returned to Switzerland, heart-broken
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: despair. Evil thenceforth became my good. Urged thus far, I had no
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: choice but to adapt my nature to an element which I had willingly
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: No sympathy may I ever find. When I first sought it, it was the love of
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: virtue, the feelings of happiness and affection with which my whole being
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: overflowed, that I wished to be participated. But now that virtue has
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

text: become to me a shadow, and that happiness and affection are turned into
title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus

title: Dracula

title: Dracula

title: Dracula
